title: The Google Developer Program is evolving
summary: The Google Developer Program is rolling out major updates to make its tools and community more accessible and powerful. These enhancements include a new flexible monthly subscription tier, a centralized GDP Forum for collaboration, and increased Gemini CLI access for all members.
content: The Google Developer Program is rolling out major updates to make its tools and community more accessible and powerful. These enhancements include a new flexible monthly subscription tier, a centralized GDP Forum for collaboration, and increased Gemini CLI access for all members.
